review:
In every field maximum people observe the benefits in increased sign. But when we see the Health  chart of Diabetes we are always eager to watch the lowest Readings in our sugar reading
Here just I want to remember my Dearest Doctor who teaches who reaches and who matches with the origin of patients problems that’s none other than the Eminent Doctor Dr.samith A Shetty.
It’s highly expensive feelings to express those Healed Feelings from his acurate treatment.I feel like I am strongly protected,I am totally rejuvenated entirely free from all the burden that I was suffering, It’s all because of his metaculous observation and analysis and acuurate treatment.
Iam beaming in Good Health 😊✨Touch wood to say that, My dearest Samith sir you are the prime reason for all that.
JustI want to convey may you always get the grace of god in all dimensions.☺️✨✨✨⚛️ Treasure to you Treasure to

review: 😊💐,,I always look forward to write in this page.when a person is in disagree ment or conquered achievement then only it is possible to celebrate here.💐🎉🎉🎊 for me from past 6 years it is almost celebration time with diabetic treatment from most sensible in all dimension with doctor  samith shetty😊.it may sound hyper to some,,,people but for me it is consistent satisfied result from his strong and sharp advices,,which i always follow like school going kid.with all my every day fighting with emotional physical ,,uncontrolled,,,inevitable,,eating disorders,,if i am doing,,good with the same treatment,,that too never a ,,extra dose of tablet,,then,,it is obviously under exact caring structure of treatment,,,there's no exaggeation,,in addition,,i never dare to ignore his instructions,,even i can't deny my endevours,,,also but my,,prompt belief,,is after crossing river we should not forget the sailor,,,of course,,,still there's is long way to go,,what ever,,the things,,are,,since i am extremely deep dwelling in spirituality,,,what i felt is,," samith sir you are good omen i any diabetic patient's life" i am always happy with the smiley staff,,charming  humble billing counter section people😊☺,,as i always say,,,my reserved prayers to you sir.

review: Dr. Smith provides exceptional care for diabetes patients, offering expert guidance and personalized treatment plans for optimal health outcomes. We visited him for Type 1 diabetes. Highly recommended for those seeking compassionate and knowledgeable diabetes care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Type 2 Diabetes Treatment,kidney and gall bladder stones,
review:
First thing which is good about Dr. Samith Shetty is the exact and proper Diagnosis, which I feel is most important to treat a problem, which he is very good at. Explanation about the problem and the treatment which is being given will be explained to you in detail and he will give you only the treatment which is necessary.
I refer anybody who is looking for a diabetes doctor to Dr. Samith Shetty.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
I was connected to Dr Samith A Shetty through Dr P Ashok Kumar. Dr Shetty's expertise, his constant grit to listen, discuss and deliver the best course of treatment has made my health the best it can be. With his treament, my sugar levels have witnessed significant change. Would certainly recommend him to anyone looking out for a wonderful, compassionate, and excellent doctor!

Dr Shetty deserves high regards.

It’s so good keep it up Dr. Shamith Shetty……..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Samith Shetty is friendly,caring .Even duringCOVID_19 he was accessible on the phone to answer questions I had about my health.When meeting in person he asks questions,listens attentively and then diagnoses accurately.I feel very comfortable and confident with Dr.Shetty andwill whole heartedly recommend him to anyone who is looking for a good doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Experience with doctor was good. But most unhappy with the consultation charges. Current visit was a just follow up visit for the last visit, just to show the medical examination report. Again charging 800rupees was not justified. Moreover this visit was about only 15 mins. For 15 mins of consultation charging 800 rupees. Hospital/management should have minimum common sense while deciding the consultation charges. Let them have some other options where they can have good amount of money and profit,Not like this.
